system.description:
You have come to rely on the combination of survival training, combat skill, and psionic power that you have cultivated. You gain the following benefits:

  • You gain access to the Awakened Mind combat tradition if you do not already have it, or a combat tradition available to the Ranger class if you do. You learn a maneuver from the Awakened Mind tradition of a level you could learn. It does not count against your maneuvers known.
  • The bonus damage from Trained Accuracy may be psychic damage if you wish. If you choose this option while your Psychic Focus is active, the dice increase to d8s.
  • Your Esper levels count as Ranger levels for the purpose of gaining the Wilderness Mystique feature, and when you do, you may select a second option.
